page.title: 07INDUSTRY IN HOLTON-LE-CLAY
page.content: There are{5 industries}in Holton-le-Clay. They are{2 scrap-yards {2 Nurseries}but{Nickerson Seed {Specialists Ltd.}is the biggest and most important. Fifty people work there in the busy season.{They have {the Queen's Warrant}They were first established in Holton-le-Clay in 1964. They sell{wheat, barley and oats, which are sold in{50kg. bags at Â£32 {per bag.}They pack their own seeds. Nickersons hire 10 tonne lorries to transport the seeds to the farms which have bought the seeds. Nickersons have 1 computer in the office and several machines in the factory. They do not sell seeds to garden shops. They only sell them to farms.
